Detailed Description

Manipulating frames: Create and destroy frames, get and set pixels, convert between pixel types (RGB, YUV, and gray), fill or copy rectangles.

Function Documentation

cvl_frame_t* cvl_frame_new (  cvl_pixel_type_t  pixel_type,
int  width,
int  height
) 
 

Parameters:
pixel_type The pixel type.
width The width.
height The height.
Returns:
The frame.
Creates a new frame. The pixel type must be CVL_PIXEL_GRAY, CVL_PIXEL_RGB, or CVL_PIXEL_YUV. This function will abort the program if (width * height) does not fit into an int or if (width * height * sizeof(cvl_pixel_t)) does not fit into a size_t, to prevent arithmetic overflows.

void cvl_frame_free (  cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame to be freed.
Frees a frame. All allocated memory will be freed. frame may be NULL; this function will do nothing in this case.

cvl_pixel_type_t cvl_frame_pixel_type (  const cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
Returns:
The pixel type of the frame.
Returns the pixel type of a frame.

int cvl_frame_width (  const cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
Returns:
The width of the frame.
Returns the width of a frame.

int cvl_frame_height (  const cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
Returns:
The height of the frame.
Returns the height of a frame.

void cvl_frame_zero (  cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
Sets all pixels in frame to zero. Note that this results in invalid pixel values for YUV frames, because the Y part must be in [16,235].

void cvl_frame_copy (  cvl_frame_t *  dst,
const cvl_frame_t *  src
) 
 

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
Copies the contents (all pixels and the pixel type) of src into dst. Both frames must have the same dimensions.

cvl_frame_t* cvl_frame_clone (  const cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame to be cloned.
Returns:
An exact copy of the given frame.
Clones a frame.

int  x,
int  y
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
x The x coordinate.
y The y coordinate.
Returns:
The pixel.
Gets a pixel from a frame.

cvl_pixel_t cvl_frame_get_r (  const cvl_frame_t *  frame,
int  x,
int  y
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
x The x coordinate.
y The y coordinate.
Returns:
The pixel.
Gets a pixel from a frame, with reflective indexing: arbitrary x and y values are accepted.

cvl_pixel_t cvl_frame_get_i (  const cvl_frame_t *  frame,
int  i
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
i The index of the pixel.
Returns:
The pixel at index i.
Gets a pixel from a frame. The index refers to all lines of the frame one after another, from top to bottom and left to right.

void cvl_frame_set (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
int  x,
int  y,
cvl_pixel_t  p
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
x The x coordinate.
y The y coordinate.
p The pixel value.
Sets the pixel at x, y in frame to p.

void cvl_frame_set_i (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
int  i,
cvl_pixel_t  p
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
i The index of the pixel.
p The pixel value.
Sets the pixel at index i in frame to p. The index refers to all lines of the frame one after another, from top to bottom and left to right.

void cvl_frame_to_gray (  cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame to be converted.
Converts a frame to gray: Sets the pixel type to CVL_PIXEL_GRAY and converts all pixels if necessary.

void cvl_frame_to_rgb (  cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame to be converted.
Converts a frame to RGB: sets the pixel type to CVL_PIXEL_RGB and converts all pixels if necessary.

void cvl_frame_to_yuv (  cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame to be converted.
Converts a frame to YUV: sets the pixel type to CVL_PIXEL_YUV and converts all pixels if necessary.

void cvl_frame_convert (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
cvl_pixel_type_t  type
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame to be converted.
type The pixel type to convert the frame to.
Converts a frame to the given pixel type: sets the pixel type and converts all pixels if necessary.

void cvl_frame_rgb_to_r (  cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame to be converted.
Converts a frame to CVL_PIXEL_RGB and isolates the red channel.

void cvl_frame_rgb_to_g (  cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame to be converted.
Converts a frame to CVL_PIXEL_RGB and isolates the green channel.

void cvl_frame_rgb_to_b (  cvl_frame_t *  frame  ) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame to be converted.
Converts a frame to CVL_PIXEL_RGB and isolates the blue channel.

void cvl_frame_fill_rect (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
int  x,
int  y,
int  w,
int  h,
cvl_pixel_t  p
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
x The x coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle.
y The y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle.
w The width of the rectangle.
h The height of the rectangle.
p The pixel value that the rectangle will be filled with.
Fills a rectangle in a frame.

void cvl_frame_copy_rect (  cvl_frame_t *  dst,
int  dst_x,
int  dst_y,
const cvl_frame_t *  src,
int  src_x,
int  src_y,
int  rwidth,
int  rheight
) 
 

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
dst_x The x coordinate of the destination rectangle's upper left corner.
dst_y The y coordinate of the destination rectangle's upper left corner.
src The source frame.
src_x The x coordinate of the source rectangle's upper left corner.
src_y The y coordinate of the source rectangle's upper left corner.
rwidth The width of the rectangle.
rheight The height of the rectangle.
Copies the given rectangle. The areas may be in the same frame, but they must not overlap!
